title: Tropical banana loaf cake
ingredients: ['120ml coconut oil, melted', '2 eggs, beaten', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '200g plain flour', '200g caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 pinch salt', '3 very ripe bananas, mashed', '120g crushed pineapple, drained', '40g toasted coconut flakes']
